materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a portrait of a girl. She is sitting kneeled on the floor, with her hands on her lap. She is wearing a long sleeved top and a wrapped skirt. She has excess hair growth especially on her face. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Girl with excessive facial hair disorder
subject_terms_2: Photographs Portrait photography Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Hypertrichosis Indigenous people
